title: Consumer preference : fiction versus non-fiction books in England 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 44.0 is found at Response Mixture of both and the minimum is found at Neither where Response is 8.0.
The minimum Response Neither has got 5.5 times less Share of respondents than the maximum Response Mixture of both.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Mixture of both and lowest at Response Neither.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 44.0 is found at Response Mixture of both and the minimum is found at Neither where Response is 8.0.
The minimum Response Neither has got 5.5 times less Share of respondents than the maximum Response Mixture of both.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Mixture of both has the highest Share of respondents and Neither has the lowest Share of respondents.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Fiction.
There is a difference of 36.0 between the maximum Response Mixture of both and minimum Response Neither.
The Response Mixture of both has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Fiction, and Non-fiction. Down to the Response Neither which is the lowest.
The Response Mixture of both has 1.76 times more Share of respondents than average.
